content:
本併保存七年
02-62- 1632 MEMORANDUM May 23; 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second DivisionOriginal signed by
C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Forwarded herewith is copy of JGWhite letter dated May 18, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4, the contents of which are self- explanatory. Please therefore cancel the said pump and motor from the list which was forwarded to you per our letter C2-62-1572 dated May 18, 1962.
O
Encl.copy of JGWhite letter cc: JGWhite BES (with copy of JGWhite letter) 2D ( * # ) CSK/sml

51. 3. 100×200
333
國史饭 Academia Historica
D
